item.description: This will be a social event to get to know one another and to serve as a send off for Jeff and Theresa who will be moving to Syracuse, New York, soon. Please RSVP to this message or call Liz 860-224-1388, or Theresa, 860-338-3922, to let them know whether you can come and whether you will be bringing anything to share. We hope to see you all there.

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: Farewell Potluck for Jeff and Theresa
